name: CvxAlgGeo
description: A small Sage package for Polynomial Optimization using tools from real algebraic geometry.

name: gnfs
description: A puppy implementation for GNFS in Mathematica

name: InventoryOptim
description: Given inventory data of multiple commodities from stock with variable capacity, provide insight on estimating future required capacity, future cost estimation, how the trends of items would change, ...

name: Irene
description: Irene is a python package that aims to be a toolkit for global optimization problems that can be realized algebraically. It generalizes Lasserre's Relaxation method to handle theoretically any optimization problem with bounded feasibility set. The method is based on solutions of generalized truncated moment problems over commutative real algebras.

name: optimithon
description: An experimental implementation of some standard optimization methods.

name: pycsdp
description: A python library for the fast sdp solver CSDP.

name: pyProximation
description: Originally written to solve systems of integrodifferential equations via collocation method in an arbitrary number of variables. The current implementation of the method is based on a finite-dimensional orthogonal system of functions.

name: SDP
description: A generic python wraper for SDP solvers

name: sksurrogate
description: SKSurrogate is a suite of tools that implements surrogate optimization for expensive functions based on scikit-learn. The main purpose of SKSurrogate is to facilitate hyperparameter optimization for machine learning models and optimized pipeline design (AutoML).
